songs.title: Droppin’ Dimes (State Farm Rap)
songs.lyrics:
[Baby Dame Dolla ft. Kevin Hooper]

[Baby Dame]
Drip, drip, drop

[Kevin]
Droppin dimes, Droppin dimes

[Verse 1]
Baby Dame Dolla here
Trailblazin dimes everywhere
I don't wanna boast
But I'm droppin dimes
From coast to coast
Droppin dimes everywhere
Like I just don't care
I'm droppin dimes
On the bike
On the stairs
I'm even droppin dimes
On my teddy bear

[Kevin]
Droppin dimes, Droppin dimes (4x)

[Verse 2]
Here's my OG
Original Grandpa
He might be cranky
He might be old
But he fierce like a timberwolf
That can't be controlled
He be smelling savings
They all up in the air
He be droppin dimes
On the honey bear

[Kevin]
Dimes (8x)

[Verse 3]
I'm a buzzer beater
Mile high nugget eater
Droppin dimes in the potty
In the shower
On top of Kevin's books
And on Mama's flowers
Like a good neighbor
He be savin us cheddar
Always got our back
Makes our family better
Cookin up savings
Bread, Cheddar
Cabbage, Clams
He always got the best
State Farm insurance plans

[Kevin]
Dimes (8x)

[Verse 1]
Baby Dame Dolla here
Droppin dimes and
Being naughty
Got kicks kicking
Harder than a
Black belt in karate
I'm droppin dimes on dimes
I'm droppin dimes
On nursery rhymes
It's time for a nap
Kick it Kevin

[Kevin]
Droppin dimes, Droppin dimes (4x)
